title: Pilot Toolchain Manifest Schema
description: Schema for PILOT artifact toolchain provenance. PILOT provenance binds artifacts to environment state at ingestion time. This is NOT experiment provenance - it does not claim experimental validity or reproducibility.

artifact_id.description: Unique identifier for the pilot artifact

ingestion_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when artifact was ingested

provenance_level.description: Fixed to 'pilot' - indicates environment binding only, not experiment provenance

disclaimer.const: PILOT PROVENANCE: Binds artifact to toolchain state at ingestion. NOT experiment provenance. Does not imply experimental validity, reproducibility, or parity with CAL-EXP runs.

uv_lock_hash.description: SHA-256 of uv.lock at ingestion time

toolchain_fingerprint.description: Combined toolchain fingerprint if available, null otherwise

source.description: Source information for the pilot artifact
